mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QM_PITM (PLNT_CD, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, SPEC_PROC_CD, RVS_CTT, DEL_YN, USE_VER_YN, CRT_IP, CRT_DS, CRT_UID, UDT_IP, UDT_DS, UDT_UID) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmVer}, #{specProcCd}, #{rvsCtt}, #{delYn}, #{useVerYn}, #{crtIp}, SYSDATE, #{crtUid}, #{udtIp}, SYSDATE, #{udtUid})

INSERT INTO QM_PITM_INFO (PLNT_CD, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, PITM_TYP, PITM_NM, PITM_EN, SAP_PRDHA, ANS_DUR_DAY, CRG_DPT_CD, SPCM_NO, MIC_YN, CLLT_MTD, CLLT_MCN, CLLT_PLA, SMP_STRG_MTD, SMP_VOL_UNIT, SMP_VOL_ANS, SMP_VOL_ETC, SMP_VOL_MNG, PKG_MTR_SPEC) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmVer}, #{pitmTyp}, (SELECT MAKTX FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MAKT WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd} AND SPRAS = #{materialLangKO}), (SELECT MAKTX FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MAKT WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd} AND SPRAS = #{materialLangEN}), (SELECT PRDHA FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), (SELECT WEBAZ FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd} AND WERKS = #{plntCd}), #{crgDptCd}, #{spcmNo}, #{micYn}, #{clltMtd}, #{clltMcn}, #{clltPla}, #{smpStrgMtd}, #{smpVolUnit}, #{smpVolAns}, #{smpVolEtc}, #{smpVolMng}, #{pkgMtrSpec})

INSERT INTO QM_PITM_INFO_SAP (PLNT_CD, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, MTR_TYP, MTR_MRP, LAB_NO, BRD_ABBR, BRD_LNE, NOM_MTR, ETR_CTN_QTY, RMTR_SPEC, NBR, FTN_YN, PCS01, PCS02, PCS03, USE_TRM, OTC_PRD, DMS_EPT_YN, PEAR_DIV, MKR_VOL, MKR_VOL_UNIT, ETN_ANS_REQ, CTRPT_NO, PER_NO, CHAG_VOL, CHAG_VOL_UNIT, DIO_YN, PRB_IN_YN, PRB_FE_YN, PNX_FE_YN) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmVer}, (SELECT MTART FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), (SELECT DISPO FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd} AND WERKS = #{plntCd}), (SELECT ZLABNO FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), #{brdAbbr}, null, (SELECT BISMT FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), null, #{rmtrSpec}, #{nbr}, #{ftnYn}, #{pcs01}, #{pcs02}, #{pcs03}, #{useTrm}, #{otcPrd}, #{dmsEptYn}, #{pearDiv}, #{mkrVol}, #{mkrVolUnit}, #{etnAnsReq}, #{ctrptNo}, -- // {perNo} 허가 번호. null, -- // {chagVol} 실충전 용량. null, -- // {chagVolUnit} 실충전 용량 단위. null, #{dioYn}, #{prbInYn}, #{prbFeYn}, #{pnxFeYn})
mapper.update: UPDATE QM_PITM_INFO_SAP SET MTR_TYP = (SELECT MTART FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), MTR_MRP = (SELECT DISPO FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARC WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd} AND WERKS = #{plntCd}), LAB_NO = (SELECT ZLABNO FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), BRD_ABBR = NVL(#{brdAbbr}, BRD_ABBR), BRD_LNE = null, NOM_MTR = (SELECT BISMT FROM MS_SAP_MTR_MARA WHERE MATNR = #{pitmCd}), ETR_CTN_QTY = null, RMTR_SPEC = NVL(#{rmtrSpec}, RMTR_SPEC), NBR = NVL(#{nbr}, NBR), FTN_YN = null, PCS01 = NVL(#{pcs01}, PCS01), PCS02 = NVL(#{pcs02}, PCS02), PCS03 = NVL(#{pcs03}, PCS03), PCS04 = null, USE_TRM = NVL(#{useTrm}, USE_TRM), OTC_PRD = NVL(#{otcPrd}, OTC_PRD), DMS_EPT_YN = null, PEAR_DIV = NVL(#{pearDiv}, PEAR_DIV), MKR_VOL = NVL(#{mkrVol}, MKR_VOL), MKR_VOL_UNIT = NVL(#{mkrVolUnit}, MKR_VOL_UNIT), BUS_CRG = null, ETN_ANS_REQ = NVL(#{etnAnsReq}, ETN_ANS_REQ), CTRPT_NO = NVL(#{ctrptNo}, CTRPT_NO), PER_NO = null, CHAG_VOL = null, CHAG_VOL_UNIT = null, DIO_YN = NVL(#{dioYn}, DIO_YN), PRB_IN_YN = NVL(#{prbInYn}, PRB_IN_YN), PRB_FE_YN = NVL(#{prbFeYn}, PRB_FE_YN), PNX_FE_YN = NVL(#{pnxFeYn}, PNX_FE_YN) WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND PITM_VER = #{pitmVer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QM_PITM_SPEC (PLNT_CD, PITM_SPEC_IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, AITM_SPEC_IDX, SPEC_PROC_CD, USE_VER_YN) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{pitmSpecIdx}, #{pitmCd}, #{pitmVer}, #{aitmSpecIdx}, #{specProcCd}, #{useVerYn})

INSERT INTO QM_PITM_SPEC (PLNT_CD, PITM_SPEC_IDX, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, AITM_SPEC_IDX, SPEC_PROC_CD, DEL_YN, USE_VER_YN, DOC_NO, ENFO_DT, CRT_IP, CRT_DS, CRT_UID, UDT_IP, UDT_DS, UDT_UID) SELECT PLNT_CD, #{pitmSpecIdx}, PITM_CD, #{pitmVer}, #{aitmSpecIdx}, #{specProcCd}, #{delYn}, #{useVerYn}, DOC_NO, ENFO_DT, #{crtIp}, SYSDATE, #{crtUid}, #{udtIp}, SYSDATE, #{udtUid} FROM QM_PITM_SPEC WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND PITM_VER = #{currentVersion} AND PITM_SPEC_IDX = (SELECT MAX(PITM_SPEC_IDX) FROM QM_PITM_SPEC WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND PITM_VER = #{currentVersion})
mapper.select: SELECT PLNT_CD, ANS_IDX FROM QT_PITM_ANS_PROC WHERE REQ_IDX IN (${value}) AND REQ_CANL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QT_PITM_ANS_REQ (PLNT_CD, REQ_IDX, ISP_REQ_NO, ISP_REQ_DT, MTR_CD, MTR_NM, BATCH_NO, ETR_QTY, INP_UNIT, SAVE_PLA, ETR_DT, PHS_ORDER_TYP, PHS_ORDER_NO, PHS_ORDER_ITM, ITM_CTG, PHS_UNIT_PRE, AMT_UNIT, CURR_CD, AMT_LOCCURR, PHS_ORDER_QTY, PHS_ORDER_UNIT, SPL_CD, SPL_NM, PHS_CRG_NM, DLV_YN, VDR_CTRT_DT, VDR_RSV_TM, VDR_RPT_RCP_CRST, LOT_NO, REP_BOM_NO, SPL_LOT_NO, MAK_DT, STRG_LMT, USE_LMT, PDT_ORDER_TYP, PDT_ORDER_NO, ITN_PRS_COMP_CD, ITN_PRS_COMP_NM, MAK_EQP, WRK_NM, MTR_DOC_NO, MTR_DOC_YR, MTR_DOC_ITM, CSM_BP_CD, CSM_NM, ADD_COL1, ADD_COL2, ADD_COL3, ADD_COL4, ADD_COL5, UDT_DS, REV_DS) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{reqIdx}, #{ispReqNo}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{mtrCd}, #{mtrNm}, #{batchNo}, #{etrQty}, #{inpUnit}, #{savePla}, #{etrDt}, #{phsOrderTyp}, #{phsOrderNo}, #{phsOrderItm}, #{itmCtg}, #{phsUnitPre}, #{amtUnit}, #{currCd}, #{amtLoccurr}, #{phsOrderQty}, #{phsOrderUnit}, #{splCd}, #{splNm}, #{phsCrgNm}, #{dlvYn}, #{vdrCtrtDt}, #{vdrRsvTm}, #{vdrRptRcpCrst}, #{lotNo}, #{repBomNo}, #{splLotNo}, #{makDt}, #{strgLmt}, #{useLmt}, #{pdtOrderTyp}, #{pdtOrderNo}, #{itnPrsCompCd}, #{itnPrsCompNm}, #{makEqp}, #{wrkNm}, #{mtrDocNo}, #{mtrDocYr}, #{mtrDocItm}, #{csmBpCd}, #{csmNm}, #{addCol1}, #{addCol2}, #{addCol3}, #{addCol4}, #{addCol5}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{revDs}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss'))
mapper.update: UPDATE QT_PITM_ANS_PROC SET HLD_YN = #{hldYn}, HLD_UID = #{hldUid}, HLD_REA = #{hldRea}, HLD_DS = SYSDATE WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND ANS_IDX = #{ansIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QT_PITM_ANS_REQ_NON_CFM (PLNT_CD, REQ_IDX, NON_CFM_SEQ, ISP_REQ_NO, ISP_REQ_NO_BLK, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5, CRT_DS, IF_INFO_IDX) VALUES (#{plntCd}, #{reqIdx}, #{nonCfmSeq}, #{ispReqNo}, #{ispReqNoBlk}, #{zexfield1}, #{zexfield2}, #{zexfield3}, #{zexfield4}, #{zexfield5}, SYSDATE, #{ifInfoIdx})
mapper.select: SELECT IDX, DEGREE, ZQCREQNO, GUID, WERKS, MATNR, MAKTX, CHARG, ERFMG, ERFME, LGORT, BUDAT, BSART, EBELN, EBELP, PSTYP, NETPR, PEINH, WAERS, DMBTR, MENGE, MEINS, LIFNR, NAME1, AFNAM, ZPARCEL, LFDAT, ZDELIVERYTIME, ZCOA, ZLOT_NO, ZALT_BOM_NO, ZVND_LOT_NO, HSDAT, ZSTORING_END_DATE, ZSHELF_LIFE_END_DATE, AUART, AUFNR, ZSUBCONNO, ZSUBCONNAME, ZEQUNR, ZWORKER, MBLNR, MJAHR, ZEILE, ZCUSTOMER, ZCUSTOMERNAME, ZEXFIELD1, ZEXFIELD2, ZEXFIELD3, ZEXFIELD4, ZEXFIELD5, IF_INFO_IDX, TO_CHAR(CRT_DS, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CRT_DS FROM IF_REV_SAP_TEST_REQUEST_HEADER

SELECT PLNT_CD, PITM_CD, PITM_VER, PITM_TYP, PITM_NM, PITM_EN, SAP_PRDHA, ANS_DUR_DAY, CRG_DPT_CD, SPCM_NO, MIC_YN, CLLT_MTD, CLLT_MCN, CLLT_PLA, SMP_STRG_MTD, SMP_VOL_UNIT, SMP_VOL_ANS, SMP_VOL_ETC, SMP_VOL_MNG, PKG_MTR_SPEC, SMP_VOL_STRG FROM QM_PITM_INFO WHERE PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND PITM_VER = #{version}

SELECT A.PLNT_CD, A.PITM_CD, A.PITM_VER, A.MTR_TYP, A.MTR_MRP, A.LAB_NO, A.BRD_ABBR, A.BRD_LNE, A.NOM_MTR, A.ETR_CTN_QTY, A.RMTR_SPEC, A.NBR, A.FTN_YN, A.PCS01, A.PCS02, A.PCS03, A.PCS04, A.USE_TRM, A.OTC_PRD, A.DMS_EPT_YN, A.PEAR_DIV, A.MKR_VOL, A.MKR_VOL_UNIT, A.BUS_CRG, A.ETN_ANS_REQ, A.CTRPT_NO, A.PER_NO, A.CHAG_VOL, A.CHAG_VOL_UNIT, A.DIO_YN, A.PRB_IN_YN, A.PRB_FE_YN, A.PNX_FE_YN, A.RMTR_CFMUL, A.QDRUG_YN, A.NOM_UNIT FROM QM_PITM_INFO_SAP A JOIN QM_PITM_INFO B ON A.PLNT_CD = B.PLNT_CD AND A.PITM_CD = B.PITM_CD AND A.PITM_VER = B.PITM_VER WHERE A.LAB_NO = #{labNo} AND B.PITM_TYP = ( SELECT PITM_TYP FROM QM_PITM_INFO WHERE A.PLNT_CD = #{plntCd} AND A.PITM_CD = #{pitmCd} AND A.PITM_VER = #{version} )
